channel.title: [317 DELTA] Adding Corporeal Beast and Tormented Demons! | Rep++
channel.description:
Okay so I want to add Tormented Demons to my server. I know I need to add the int's into my Class5.Java file (client sided) but idk where I need to put the anims.
Also, I already have the Corp. Beast added but not with the correct attack anims.
This is the link im using for the anims: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?topic=520869.0
[u]IN WHAT FILE DO I ADD THE CODES FOR NPC ANIMS?[/u]
Rep++ for any help!
